text: Zebedayo Bayo (born 20 May 1976 in Arusha) is a Tanzanian long-distance runner who specializes in the marathon. He won the City-Pier-City Loop half marathon in the Hague in 2000.City-Pier-City Half Marathon - List of winners ==Achievements== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |rowspan=3|1997 |Ferrara Marathon
